36#include "ntlm.h"
37
38OM_uint32 GSSAPI_CALLCONV _gss_ntlm_release_cred
39 (OM_uint32 * minor_status,
40 gss_cred_id_t * cred_handle
41 )
42{
43 ntlm_cred cred;
44
45 if (minor_status)
46 *minor_status = 0;
47
48 if (cred_handle == NULL || *cred_handle == GSS_C_NO_CREDENTIAL)
49 return GSS_S_COMPLETE;
50
51 cred = (ntlm_cred)*cred_handle;
52 *cred_handle = GSS_C_NO_CREDENTIAL;
53
54 if (cred->username)
55 free(cred->username);
56 if (cred->domain)
57 free(cred->domain);
58 if (cred->key.data) {
59 memset(cred->key.data, 0, cred->key.length);
60 free(cred->key.data);
61 }
62
63 return GSS_S_COMPLETE;
64}
65
